headline: GE Aerospace Delta Deal And Leadership Shift Test GE Valuation
summary: GE Aerospace, part of General Electric (NYSE:GE), secured a major contract to supply GEnx engines and long-term services to Delta Air Lines for 30 Boeing 787-10 aircraft. At the same time, GE Aerospace named Mohamed Ali as President and CEO of Commercial Engines and Services, expanding his role to cover the full engine lifecycle. These updates reflect meaningful shifts in GE Aerospace's commercial engine business structure and its relationship with a key airline customer. For investors...
